snippet: The total earnings for Hollywood movie writers was $349.1 million, the lowest level in the last four years and far below a peak of $526.6 million in 2007, when studios were stockpiling scripts in advance of an anticipated writers' strike.
abstract: The total earnings for Hollywood movie writers was $349.1 million, the lowest level in the last four years and far below a peak of $526.6 million in 2007, when studios were stockpiling scripts in advance of an anticipated writers' strike.

headline.main: Earnings for Hollywood Screenwriters Fell 12.6% in 2011, Guild Reports
